apply.title: Thailand Visa Application
apply.subtitle: Complete your visa application with AI-powered assistance

step1.title: Choose Your Visa Type
step1.description: Select the type of visa that best matches your travel purpose to Thailand.

step2.title: Personal Information
step2.description: Provide your personal details for the visa application.
step2.personalInfoDescription: Please provide accurate information as it appears on your passport.
step2.fullNamePlaceholder: Enter your full name as on passport
step2.passportUploadDesc: Upload a clear photo of your passport for automatic data extraction
step2.dragDropPassport: Drag and drop your passport photo here, or click to select
step2.passportError: Failed to extract passport data. Please enter manually.

step3.title: Document Upload
step3.description: Upload the required documents for your visa application.
step3.requiredDocumentsDesc: Please upload all required documents in clear, high-quality images or PDFs.
step3.passportCopyDesc: Clear copy of passport main page
step3.dragDrop: Drag and drop files here, or click to select
step3.minimumFiles: Please upload at least 3 required documents to continue.

step4.title: THINKNEO AI is Analyzing Your Application
step4.description: Our advanced AI is processing your information and documents to provide personalized recommendations.
step4.analyzingDesc: AI is scanning and verifying all uploaded documents with advanced OCR technology
step4.verifyingDesc: Checking compliance with Thailand visa requirements and regulations
step4.calculatingDesc: AI is analyzing your profile against successful visa applications database
step4.preparingDesc: Generating personalized suggestions to optimize your application

step5.title: AI Analysis Results
step5.description: Here are your personalized visa application insights and recommendations.
step5.probabilityDesc: Based on AI analysis of your application
step5.aiRecommendationsDesc: Personalized suggestions to improve your application
step5.strongProfileDesc: Your application shows excellent compliance with visa requirements
step5.bankStatementDesc: Consider including additional financial documents for stronger application
step5.travelInsuranceDesc: Adding travel insurance can improve your application strength

step1.description: AI instantly extracts data from your passport photo using advanced OCR technology.

step2.description: AI analyzes your profile and recommends the best visa type for your needs.

step3.description: AI verifies all documents and ensures 100% compliance with requirements.

step4.title: Smart Submission
step4.description: AI submits your application and monitors progress with real-time updates.

tripManagement.title: Complete Trip Management
tripManagement.description: AI manages all bureaucratic aspects of your Thailand trip so you can focus on planning the fun parts.

bureaucraticPlanning.title: Bureaucratic Planning
bureaucraticPlanning.description: AI handles all paperwork and deadlines with smart scheduling and reminders.

documentTimeline.title: Document Timeline

complianceMonitoring.description: AI ensures all requirements are met and alerts you to any issues instantly.

day1.title: Arrival & Bangkok Discovery
day1.description: Welcome to Thailand! Start your journey with iconic landmarks

activity1.title: Airport Transfer & Hotel Check-in
activity1.description: Comfortable arrival with premium airport pickup service

activity2.title: Grand Palace & Wat Phra Kaew
activity2.description: Explore Thailand's most sacred temple and royal palace complex

activity3.title: Chao Phraya River Dinner Cruise
activity3.description: Romantic evening cruise with traditional Thai cuisine

day2.title: Cultural Immersion Experience
day2.description: Deep dive into authentic Thai culture and traditions

activity1.title: Wat Pho Temple & Thai Massage
activity1.description: Visit the birthplace of traditional Thai massage

activity2.title: Chatuchak Weekend Market
activity2.description: Shop for unique souvenirs and taste local street food

activity3.title: Thai Cooking Class Experience
activity3.description: Learn to cook authentic Thai dishes with expert chefs

day3.title: Beach & Wellness Day
day3.description: Relax and rejuvenate with Thailand's natural beauty

activity1.title: Beach Excursion & Water Sports
activity1.description: Enjoy pristine beaches with optional water activities

activity2.title: Traditional Thai Spa Treatment
activity2.description: Indulge in authentic Thai wellness therapies

hotel.name: Mandarin Oriental Bangkok
hotel.description: Luxury riverside hotel with exceptional service and stunning views of the Chao Phraya River
hotel.feature3: Multiple dining options including Michelin-starred restaurants

restaurant.name: Gaggan Anand
restaurant.description: World-renowned progressive Indian cuisine with innovative molecular gastronomy techniques
restaurant.feature3: Unique fusion of Indian flavors and modern techniques

transport.name: Premium Airport Transfer & City Tours
transport.description: Comfortable private transportation with English-speaking drivers and flexible scheduling
transport.feature3: Flexible pickup times and custom routes
